artist: Artist: Andy Baird; Artist: Michael Brehm; Artist: Robert Corbit; Artist: Mike DeVoni; Artist: Frank Gaard; Artist: Chris Karcher; Artist: Lillian Koponen; Artist: Mike McCoy; Artist: Greg Miller; Artist: Ann Morgan; Artist: Ed Rath; Artist: Alyn Silberstein; Artist: Gill Smitherman; Artist: Melissa Stang; Artist: Terre van Haren; Artist: Coleen West; Artist: Jon West; Artist: Fritz Wolfmeyer; Artist: Chris Woodward; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 22 pages, saddle-stapled, and one leaf tipped in; black-and-white publication with some red; fancy lettering across top--"Art Police Gazette"; in center a large head of a woman with pointed end of banner hanging in front of her face and skeleton falling on top of her head; red and white small card insert with same head of woman and banner in front of her face on front side; each page is one cover, and all are used, varying from copy to copy
title: Artpolice, Vol. 11, No .2: "All Cover Issue"
